ValidationRule.description: Product field must not be blank in order to submit a Claim.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(Origin) = 'Owner', TEXT(Origin) = 'Contractor', TEXT(Origin) = 'Distributor' ), OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), TEXT( Claim_Stage__c ) = 'Submitted', ISBLANK(Product__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure a Product is selected prior to submitting the Claim.
